channel.title: Help me please i cant use gs's and vls and cant see my spec emote with d claw
channel.description:
HELP ME PLEASE I CANT USE GODSOWRDS AND VESTA LONG ON MY Z508 AND WHEN I SPEC I DONT SEE MY HIT AND EMOTE HELP ME PLEASEEE...
HOW AND WHERE TO FIX IT ????

item.title: Help me please i cant use gs's and vls and cant see my spec emote with d claw
item.dc:creator: @vincentpet6 vincentpet6
item.description:
@vincentpet6 wrote:

Epic don’t be mean to him he just needs help,
1.Well you have to code vesta longs correctly to make them work properly try looking up a tutorial.
2. maybe your source or client doesn’t work correctly.
3. are you sure its 508 useally godswords would work.

Hope I helped ~vince~

item.title: Help me please i cant use gs's and vls and cant see my spec emote with d claw
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Step 1. Take off CAPS LOCK.
Step 2. Try learning how to code a 508, or start with a 317.
Step 3. Try a different 508 source if Steps 1-2 fail you.

Read full topic
